title: Pantheon Store Icon?
body:
This is what pantheon looks like on the new store: https://gyazo.com/be35fb33851a038c0ab3c5fee674aca3
We have had no news about a new splash art for him, so I'm wondering why this is showing up. 
This is also the case for EUW

replies.body:
It was teased in **LCS** almost 2 years back now I heard. It happens more often than you'd think. All our most recent splash arts, including the new **Warwick** one, were ready in the [summer of 2014](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/EmA7hAcQ-updated-splash-arts-teased-for-anivia-gragas-graves-maokai-and-warwick). 

There's still an [**Irelia** splash](http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/1653/3374/original.jpg) from 2014 EU LCS that hasn't been released yet XD

I don't know how **Pantheon**'s new splash got into our patch though, I'd imagine they were testing it and forgot to remove it for the live patch. 

You can find the full splash art [here](http://i.imgur.com/ib34FE9.jpg) BTW if you're interested.
Whoaaa that looks so much better!
